item.description:
Event: Historical walking tour of Mount Auburn Cemetery. Come enjoy the beautiful and some serene views with a chance to learn about some of the lives of prominent Bostonites from the past. Then we will go for some Coffee/tea and good conversation afterwards.

Trip Coordinator: Heather: Heather925@rcn.com
RSVP: Required by June 11th, use the email address above and include a cell phone number in your response for contact on the 23rd. Heather can provide more details on the arrangements if you want them when you RSVP, send it to the address listed above.
Meet: 1pm at the Cemetery entrance, rain cancels.
Cost: $5.00 for non-members

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Walk at Mount Auburn Cemetery
